con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-Iso8583TopupService-ATM
con:testCase.con:description:
Relevant user story is: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2417
Implement test-case for most of possible negative use-case with predefined error-message on prod with prerequisites and result validation:
Implement tests for duplicate topup Implement tests for duplicate cancel Implement tests for topup canceled before Implement tests for cancel unknown topup Additional reimplement all negative use-cases against Proxy directly against atm-core-service.

con:config.script:
/* * This script format generated msisdns to format 0+number * Date: 26.07.2016 * Autor: Michael Gordon */
// set in properties msisdns testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue('MSISDN',context.expand( '${#Project#MSISDN-Piranha-OK}' )) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue('Date',context.expand( '${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}' )) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue('ID_1','1'+context.expand( '${#Project#Random5}' )) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue('ID_2','2'+context.expand( '${#Project#Random5}' )) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue('ID_3','3'+context.expand( '${#Project#Random5}' ))

con:request.name: 140N_topup-duplicate
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/iso8583topupservice/v1/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:topup> <transactionRequestData> <transactionData> <amount>${#TestCase#Amount}</amount> <!--type: string--> <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN}</msisdn> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#TestCase#Date}</paymentDate> <!--type: string--> <cardType>13</cardType> <!--type: string--> <partnerId>${#TestSuite#Partner-3-Code} ${#TestSuite#BLZ}</partnerId> <!--type: string--> <processingCode>${#TestSuite#abwZeichenTripleDES}</processingCode> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <serverId>252501</serverId> <!--type: string--> <terminalId>${#TestSuite#NetzbetreiberID}${#TestSuite#TerminalID}</terminalId> <!--type: string--> <transactionId>${#TestCase#ID_2}</transactionId> </transactionData> <!--type: string--> <isoGwServerId>280105</isoGwServerId> <!--type: string--> <iso8583Protocol>ATM</iso8583Protocol> </transactionRequestData> </v1:topup> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.token: BrandId: 1 is not accepted for partner
